Branding and colors

Mid Teal $primary #0D4754 .bg-primary
Secondary $secondary #093944 .bg-secondary
Info $info #042228 .bg-info
Danger $danger #202020 .bg-danger

Typography

h1 - 72px/80px

h2 - 38px/48px

h3 - 28px/32px

h4 - 24px/32px

h5 - 20px/28px
h6 - 18px

Inline text elements

You can use the mark tag to highlight text.

                                                    
                                                        <p>You can use the mark tag to <mark>highlight</mark> text.</p>

This line of text is meant to be treated as no longer accurate.

                                                    
                                                        <p><s>This line of text is meant to be treated as no longer accurate.</s></p>

This line of text will render as underlined

                                                    
                                                        <p><u>This line of text will render as underlined</u></p>

This line of text is meant to be treated as fine print.

                                                    
                                                        <p><small>This line of text is meant to be treated as fine print.</small></p>

This line rendered as bold text.

                                                    
                                                        <p><strong>This line rendered as bold text.</strong></p>

This line rendered as italicized text.

                                                    
                                                        <p><em>This line rendered as italicized text.</em></p>
Lists
  • Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Inventore ad animi maxime harum quaerat impedit sit exercitationem dignissimos odit rem.
  • Consectetur adipiscing elit
  • Integer molestie lorem at massa
  • Facilisis in pretium nisl aliquet
  • Phasellus iaculis neque
  • Vestibulum laoreet porttitor sem

Text Colors

.text-primary - $primary

.text-secondary - $secondary

.text-white - $white

Reusable Components

Buttons (Default)

                                                        
                                                            <button href="#" class="btn btn-primary">Button Primary</button>
                                                            

                                                            <button href="#" class="btn btn-primary" disabled>Button Primary</button>
                                                        
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            <button href="#" class="btn btn-outline-charcoal">Button Outline Charcoal</button>
                                                            

                                                            <button href="#" class="btn btn-outline-charcoal" disabled>Button Outline Charcoal Disabled</button>

Links

Normal link example, Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Laudantium cupiditate voluptate repellat. Illum, esse eveniet. Quibusdam dolor exercitationem saepe ipsum aspernatur corrupti hic veniam possimus.

Link Styled, Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Laudantium cupiditate voluptate repellat. Illum, esse eveniet. Quibusdam dolor exercitationem saepe ipsum aspernatur corrupti hic veniam possimus.

<a href="#" class="link-styled">Link Styled</a>

Breadcrumb

  1. Blog
  2. Blog Post
  3. Smart Cities
                                                            
                                                                <nav aria-label="breadcrumb">
    <ol class="breadcrumb d-flex list-unstyled text-gray-4 mb-0">
        <li class="breadcrumb-item"><a href="#" title="Title">Blog</a></li>
        <li class="breadcrumb-item"><a href="#" title="Title">Blog Post</a></li>
        <li class="breadcrumb-item active"><a href="#" title="Title">Smart Cities</a></li>
    </ol>
</nav>

Social Links

                                                                
                                                                    <ul class="social-links list-unstyled d-flex">


                                                                             <li class="circle">

                                                                                  <i class="icon-facebook-normal"></i>

                                                                               </a>

                                                                               </a>

                                                                             </li>


                                                                    </ul>

Modal

Modal plugin to add dialogs to your site for lightboxes, user notifications, or completely custom content.

Launch demo modal
                                                            
                                                                <a href="#modalDemo" class="btn btn-primary btn-modal" data-toggle="modal">Launch demo modal</a>

<!-- Modal -->
    <div class="modal fade" id="modalDemo" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="modalDemoLabel" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="modal-dialog modal-dialog-centered">
            <div class="modal-content">
                <div class="modal-header">
                    <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                        <span aria-hidden="true">&times;</span>
                    </button>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-body">
                    <h2>Modal Title</h2>
                    <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Commodi nam perferendis suscipit quasi harum itaque maxime, recusandae accusantium exercitationem illo quisquam labore laudantium possimus? Dolorem.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

Forms

Please fill in the required field.
                                                                
                                                                    <form class="wpcf7-form init wpcf7-acceptance-as-validation">
    <div class="form-group">
        <label for="exampleInputEmail1" class="eyebrow">First Name</label>
        <input
            type="email"
            class="form-control"
            id="exampleInputEmail1"
            aria-describedby="emailHelp"
        />
    </div>
    <div class="form-group">
        <label for="exampleInputEmail1" class="eyebrow">Email address</label>
        <input
            type="email"
            class="form-control"
            id="exampleInputEmail1"
            aria-describedby="emailHelp"
        />
        <span class="wpcf7-not-valid-tip" role="alert" aria-hidden="true"
            >Please fill in the required field.</span
        >
    </div>
    <div class="form-group">
        <label for="exampleInputEmail1" class="eyebrow"
            >Disabled fieldset example</label
        >
        <input
            type="email"
            class="form-control"
            id="exampleInputEmail1"
            aria-describedby="emailHelp"
            disabled
        />
    </div>
    <div class="form-group form-group--primary mb-5">
        <label for="exampleFormControlSelect2" class="eyebrow my-5"
            >Example multiple select</label
        >
        <select class="selectpicker">
            <option>Popular topics</option>
            <option>Topic Lorem ipsum</option>
            <option>Assumenda commodi, voluptates</option>
            <option>Consectetur adipisicing</option>
            <option>soluta provident</option>
        </select>
    </div>
    <div class="form-group my-5">
        <div class="custom-control custom-checkbox mb-3">
            <input
                type="checkbox"
                class="custom-control-input"
                id="customCheck1"
            />
            <label class="custom-control-label" for="customCheck1"
                >Check this custom checkbox</label
            >
        </div>
        <div class="custom-control custom-checkbox">
            <input
                type="checkbox"
                class="custom-control-input"
                id="customCheck2"
            />
            <label class="custom-control-label" for="customCheck2"
                >Another one</label
            >
        </div>
    </div>
    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit</button>
</form>
